resources.string:
Line

Description

This is a classic stroke without any modifications.

Fill mode : Yes.

Scraw

Description

This is a random stroke. Your stroke is decomposed in different segments and each one are deformed randomly.

Options

Noise : amplitude of a deformation in a segment.

Details : number of deformations for one segment.

Flow : segment frequency. Short flow means a short and more deformed segments for the same details value.

Fill mode : Yes.

Splatter

Description

This is a dripping stroke. This is composed of a main stroke and some drips. They are both with a size inversely proportional to the speed.

Options

Size : size parameters of the drips and the main stroke.

Drips : number of drips.

Fill mode : No.

Ribbon

Description

This stroke is composed of several ribbons. Caution : a very long stroke (without remove your finger) can reduce the performances.

Options

Gravity : attraction to the bottom parameter.

Friction : black magic parameter.

Spacing : the frequency at which a ribbon is added

Fill mode : Yes.

XSphape

Description

This is a randomly broken line stroke. Your stroke is decomposed in different segments and each one is composed of random straight lines.

Options

Noise : length parameter of the straight lines.

Details : number of straight lines for one segment.

Flow : segment frequency. Short flow means a short and more deformed segment for the same details value.

Fill mode : Yes.

Paintbrush

Description

This is emulation of a "real brush" with few bristles.

Options

Bristles : number of bristles. Caution : a high number can reduce the performances without specially looking better.

Fill mode : No.

Basic shape

Description

Your stroke is composed of different basic shapes : Box, Circle or Triangle. The stroke can be composed of one kind or all three randomly chosen. The size of a shape is proportional to the stroke speed.

Fill mode : Yes.

Ball

Description

This brush create "balls". One ball is a group of concentric circles.

Options

Size : radius size parameter.

Radius : number of concentric circles for one ball.

Flow : frequency of balls.

Fill mode : Yes.

Straight Line

Description

One stroke will be an only straight line. If snapping is enabled, the beginning of the line will be the closest extremity of previous lines if it is not too far.

Fill mode : Yes.

Web brush

Description

This stroke is composed of small straight lines. If an extremity of one line is close enough to the extremity of an other line (from this stroke or previous ones), there will be an extra line between these two extremities.

Options

Max Dist : Maximal distance between two extremities to have an extra line.

Fill mode : No.

Sketch brush

Description

Variation of the web brush (see web brush), where the extra line is shorter and doesn\'t touch the extremities and its extremities aren\'t used by the brush.

XShape V2

Description

This is an other randomly broken lines stroke with a different algorithm than XShape.

Options

Noise : randomness of the broken lines.

Fill mode : Yes.
